about.title: We are developers dedicated to your project
about.subtitle: In AstraDev we care for our client and his project.
about.description: We know that every client is unique and we take each project to a personal level.We understand the client's situation and we propose the best solution that fits his business needs.

specialty.title: | Our specialty
specialty.subtitle: We are experts in relieving stress from your shoulders and making your job easier.

process.title: | Our process
process.subtitle: In AstraDev, we care about each project delivery time, since the first meeting until the official delivery. Following the Agile Development Methodology, we have standardized this process to give the best possible service to our clients.

project.title: | Our projects
project.subtitle: Each project is a new experience.

certification.title: Certifications
certification.description: Astradev is always searching for continuous learning and improvement. This has taken us to obtain the following certifications and awards:

contact.title: |Contact us
contact.subtitle: Tell us about your project, we are eager to work with you.
